title: Mindful Lifestyle Coaching — Inspired Healing
cleaned_text: Mindful lifestyle Coaching What is it? Mindfulness is defined as the quality or mental state achieved by focusing one's awareness on the present moment, while calmly acknowledging and accepting one's feelings, thoughts, and bodily sensations without judgment. With mindfulness, it is possible to awaken to the many mysteries, challenges, and miracles of our existence. Mindful Lifestyle Coaching offers clients the guidance necessary to bring greater depth and quality to all nuances of their life. Who is it for? Mindful lifestyle coaching is for anyone who might not necessarily be looking for psychotherapeutic treatment at this time, but who is looking for ways in which to discover more about their personal connection between mind, body, and spirit on a daily basis. If you are seeking a lifestyle that is more rooted in the joy of present moment awareness, and would like extra support and guidance as to HOW you can achieve it--Mindful lifestyle coaching is for you! What can it look like? Mindful lifestyle coaching is catered to an individual's specific needs. However it can include a variety of topics and interventions including: - Meditation - Mindful eating - Ayurvedic medicine - Intentional movement and exercise - How and when to use healing crystals - Ways in which to incorporate essential oils - How to develop personal cleansing rituals (daily, monthly, seasonally) - Breathing techniques - Progressive Muscle Relaxation - Exploration of mantras - Unique self-care techniques
